Title: Illuminated Frontispiece with Medallion
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Description: This illuminated frontispiece from Walters manuscript W.620 is inscribed with the title Kitab-i bustan in the polychrome and gold medallion (shamsah).
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Painting; Iran; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Sa'di (died 691 AH/AD 1292)
